comments.body: You might need to use a paginator here if there might ever be more than 50 results

No, because this module sets a metric filter for `LogGroupName && filterName`. 

With the combination of

```
response = cwl.describe_metric_filters(
        logGroupName="/ecs/access,
        filterNamePrefix="404"
    )
```

is only one match possible.  
Either there is already one filter and we fetch the values of the metric filter, or we create the metric filter.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +173,177 @@
    # check if metric filter exists
    response = cwl.describe_metric_filters(
        logGroupName=log_group_name,
        filterNamePrefix=filter_name
